twitter.content: Just shipped a new feature that reduced our API response times by 40%. The secret? Proper database indexing and a Redis caching layer. Sometimes the simplest solutions are the best.
Hot take: The best code is the code you don't write. Before adding a new dependency, ask yourself if you really need it or if 20 lines of vanilla JS would do the job.
